answers.answer: I have all your symtoms.  Diarrhea 3-4x in the morning, gurgling stomach and cramps all day.  Had all the test done including Siliacs and colonoscopy all neg.  Dr. put me on an SSRI stating it Irritable Bowel syndrom.  It has helped.

question: I've had constant diarrhea for over a year now.  Now, I also have excessive gas, gurgly stomach, need to use the bathroom as soon as I eat.  My doctor has done 2 endoscopy and the last one showed a bacterial infection.  he thinks that my problems are associated with my diabetes.  he's given me antibiotics but they help very little and only for a little while.  what else can i do?  i'm afraid that there might be someother organ involved that he's not looking at.  he did a sonagram of the abdomen and it came back ok.
title: Stomach Baterial Infection
